discussion.author: strub
discussion.comment: I've several development  depending on this module. It's location is currently quite artificial and force projects to pull a lot of dependencies.

discussion.author: gares
discussion.comment:
> Shoudn't this file be .gitignored ?

I think you are right...

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: I am in favor, @ggonthier what do you think?

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: Since we decided to have a staging/unstable area, I guess this file would be better there.

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
Actually, the ```near``` tactic from mathcomp-analysis, looks more promising than bigenough.
https://github.com/math-comp/analysis/blob/master/topology.v#L413

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: Waiting for `near`, `big_enough` has now its own repository https://github.com/math-comp/bigenough.
